EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting the Honeywell Aerospace Technical Publications Team.
Discrepancy are reported online on our website and are handled by a different team.
Follow the steps below to report to create a discrepancy on our portal using the link below:
https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace
When the Publication appears on the screen, 1) Select View More Details 2) Select Report a Discrepancy. 3) Input your discrepancy notes and/or feedback and submit.
Once completed a discrepancy request will go directly to the Discrepancy Team who will handle your request.
Thanks again! We appreciate your business,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} Honeywell Aerospace Technical Publications Team Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com 1-800-601-3099 Ext 3 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
